is estimated numerically using three alternative methods namely the rectangular, trapezoidal and 
Simpson’s rules with a common step size. In this context, which one of the following statements is 
TRUE
? 
 
(A) Simpson’s rule as well as rectangular rule of estimation will give NON-zero error. 
 
(B) Only Simpson’s rule of estimation will give zero error. 
 
(C) Only the rectangular rule of estimation will give zero error. 
 
(D) Simpson’s rule, rectangular rule as well as trapezoidal rule of estimation will give NON-zero error.
 
(B) 
Question 16 
 
Soil deposit formed due to transportation by wind is termed as 
 
(A) aeolian deposit 
 
 
(B) lacustrine deposit 
 
(C) alluvial deposit 
 
 
(D) estuarine deposit
 
(A)

question_text:
Question 13 
 
The traffic starts discharging from an approach at an intersection with the signal turning green. The 
constant headway considered from the fourth or fifth headway position is referred to as 
 
(A) intersection headway  
 
(B) saturation headway 
 
 
(C) effective headway 
 
 
(D) discharge headway 
Ans. 
(B)

(B)
